languages.text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. Now I can request permission to give my report."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. Now I can request permission to give my report."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."
"Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."

languages.text: «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Solicito permiso para informar».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Solicito permiso para informar».

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。報告の許可を求めます」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。報告の許可を求めます」

languages.text: “谢谢您，舰长大人。请求允许进行报告。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢您，舰长大人。请求允许进行报告。”

languages.text: "Danke, Lord Captain. Erbitte Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Lord Captain. Erbitte Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten."

languages.text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Puis-je vous faire mon rapport ? »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Puis-je vous faire mon rapport ? »

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan. Rapor vermek için izninizi istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain. Requesting permission to report."
